name: Going Home (ReyGameDev)
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 in a week  :)

Going Home is a 3D First-Person Horror game where you were going home after getting off from the bus and walk down through an alley. But something or someone is following you from behind. Get inside the apartment before it gets you!

Controls:

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look

Credits:

Sound Effect

  • Ambient Sound by MegaBlasterRecordings
  • Footstep by Nox_Sound
  • Whisper by geoneo0
  • Jumpscare by jdupre01
  • Tension 1 by A.Deathy
  • Tension 2 by Werra

Fonts

  • Dafont

DON'T STARE FOR TOO LONG...
